title: After God
description: Japan has been "invaded" by the gods. Tokyo, dwelling place of the gods, has been declared a "danger zone" and tightly sealed off by an impenetrable fence. A girl by the name of Waka keeps gazing beyond the fence's boundaries. Waka came to Tokyo from Saga in order to see her friend, but there she meets Tokinaga, a researcher who had been vigilantly guarding the city. It's this meeting that will change the fate of the world...
language: fr ru pt-br vi en

title: Shimeji Simulation
description:
A surreal yet heartwarming 4-koma series about everyday life.  
  
From the author of Shoujo Shuumatsu Ryokou/Girls' Last Tour.
language: pl fr ru th en it pt-br cs fa es-la

title: Karakai Jouzu no (Moto) Takagi-san
description:
Takagi and Nishikata are now married and have a kindergarten-aged daughter named Chi. See how much some things have changed, and others have curiously stayed the same!  
  
*Note: The volumes collect the chapters in a different order than the web version. The chapters here follow the web numbering without any volumes.*
language: en pt-br es-la id ru fa hi it fr pl vi pt de

title: Release That Witch
description:
A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!  


---
language: en ru tr uk fr pt-br es-la es id ar

title: Karakai Jouzu (?) no Nishikata-san
description: In this spinoff of "Teasing Master Takagi-san", and continuation of "Teasing Master (nee) Takagi-san", Chi Nishikata tries her hardest to tease her classmate Ooshiro, but for some reason it feels like she's met him somewhere. Can she finally get one over on him and remember her past?
language: fr es-la tl en pt-br ru id uk

title: Second Life Ranker
description:
Yeon-woo had a twin brother who disappeared five years ago. One day, a pocket watch left by his brother returned to his possession. Inside, he found a hidden diary in which was recorded “By the time you hear this, I guess I will be already dead….”  
Obelisk, the Tower of the Sun God, a world where several universes and dimensions intersect. In this world, his brother had fallen victim to betrayal while climbing up the tower. After learning the truth, Yeon-woo decided to climb the tower along with his brother’s diary.  
Yeon-woo then proceeds to go through the same trials and fights as his younger brother did as an anonymous player. His goal? Defeating the Obelisk Tower and get revenge for his brother.  

---

title: Amai-san wa Tsumetakute Amai
description: Amai-san, the beautiful JK who lives next door, may seem cool, but in reality... only I know her sweet side?!
language: th es-la ru pt-br id en vi it fr

title: Doom Breaker
description:
"An opportunity's an opportunity, no matter how slimy these gods who grant them may be. If they want a show, I'll give them one!"

The final human, the greatest warrior on Earth, is defeated in his last stand against the Demon Lord, yet is given a second chance by the gods to go back ten years before the world's end.

"I'll pummel them all; the Demon Lord who took everything from me, and the gods who observed it all as entertainment!"

---
Zephyr is the last human fighting evil in a world abandoned by the gods. When he is killed in battle by Tartarus, the god of destruction, all hope for humanity seems lost. But Zephyr's fate is not sealed -- the gods who find his battles entertaining have gifted him a second chance at life, as he is sent ten years into the past, back to when he was a slave instead of the most powerful human alive. Can Zephyr get his revenge against Tartarus and save the woman he loves, or is he doomed to repeat the past?

---
[Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BOqe_XcNCBo)

title: Eleceed
description:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

---

title: The Demon King's Daughter Is Too Kind!!
description: The strongest Demon King, Ahriman, rules every part of the world. However, he had to stop his world conquest all of a sudden. What is the unexpected reason behind this…?
language: tr pt-br id en ru fr es-la pl

title: Whisper Me a Love Song
description: Bubbly, energetic first-year high school student Himari falls head over heels for her senpai Yori after hearing her band perform on the first day of school. Himari tells Yori she just loves her, and, to Himari’s surprise, Yori says she loves Himari back! But when Himari realizes that she and her senpai are feeling two different kinds of love, she begins to ask herself what “love” really means…
language: en tr ru pt-br it fr es-la es id

title: Surviving the Game as a Barbarian
description:
The protagonist, Lee Hansoo, finally reached the boss stage after nine years of playing the game “Dungeon and Stone”, which no one had been able to clear until now.

However, just as he entered the boss room, he saw a notification alerting him that he had cleared the tutorial and that he had possessed the body of the barbarian, Bjorn Jandel, who was a playable character in the game!

In the world of “Dungeon and Stone”, only one city remained standing after the destruction of the world. A labyrinth would open every month, offering explorers a chance to clear it for rewards. In this world where barbarians are seen as useless in everything but battle, a barbarian who does not fight will not be able to survive. If one cannot pay the outrageous taxes demanded by the city, the only fate that awaits is a downgrade in status to a ‘lower-class citizen’. If it is revealed that you are possessing the character you are playing, you will be named an “evil spirit” and killed. The only way for Lee Hansoo to survive is to enter the labyrinth and fight while risking his life.

With the skills he has accumulated over nine years of gameplay and a stupidly strong barbarian physique, he strives to survive in this game!
language: fr pt-br it pl

title: Stairs
description:
Become the strongest, at the World's End.  
  
At the end of the world there will be ' Stairs', and at the end there will be everything.  
Go beyond the limits and be born as the strongest person at the end of the world!
language: it fr en ru id

title: Koisuru (Otome) no Tsukurikata
description: A popular guy who's secretly interested in cosmetics asks to practice makeup on his dull childhood friend... and he ends up looking cute?!
language: id pt-br vi en es-la fr it

title: The Ravages of Time
description:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!
language: pt-br en ru ar it fr

title: Usuzumi no Hate
description: In a deserted post-apocalyptic metropolis riddled with a mysterious material a young girl is searching for any signs of life and supplies.
language: id en uk pl es-la it tr pt-br ar fr

title: Tomo-chan wa Onna no ko!
description: Tomo Aizawa was able to successfully confess to her crush Junichirou Kubota. There is only one problem: He just sees her as his buddy. He thought that she was a boy until they went to middle school together, because her grade school was in a different school district.
language: fr pl tr es-la pt-br de he ru en it ca ne uk pt id

title: Mieruko-chan
description: All of a sudden, Miko is able to see grotesque monsters all around her; but no one else can. Rather than trying to run away or face them, she instead musters all of her courage and… ignores them. Join in on her day-to-day life as she keeps up her best poker face despite the supernatural goings-on.
language: ru en id es-la tr uk ar it hu fr

title: SSS-Class Suicide Hunter
description:
In the mysterious, RPG dungeon-like Tower, Gongja Kim lives a mundane existence, envying all the star hunters. One day, his wish for more is granted with a legendary skill to copy others’ abilities… at the cost of his life. Before he can make sense of it, he’s killed by the #1 hunter, the Flame Emperor! But this activates his skill and now he’s copied a new one, the ability to travel back in time upon death.

How will Gongja use these skills to outplay the competition and rise to the top?
language: en it fr id de fa pl hu uk pt-br

title: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kitan - Jack the Ripper no Jikenbo
description: In 1888, a number of prostitutes were murdered in London, by someone known only as "Jack the Ripper". The murderer takes to the streets each day, looking to slit some unfortunate woman open... The past of Jack the Ripper, the English gentleman who represented the human side in the fourth round of the struggle between God and mankind known as Ragnarok, who was one of the top-three most popular characters in the character poll, is finally revealed!
language: en es-la zh-hk pt-br fr id
